name: XPathResult.singleNodeValue
description: The read-only singleNodeValue property of the XPathResult interface returns a Node value or null in case no node was matched of a result with XPathResult.resultType being ANY_UNORDERED_NODE_TYPE or FIRST_ORDERED_NODE_TYPE.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 XPath Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'XPathResult.singleNodeValue' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 XPath Specification' specification.
